description: Experience the ultimate luxury living with breathtaking views of the ocean.
long_description: Graced with striking colonnades and draped in the splendor of Mughal and Ottoman artistic influence, The Chedi Katara Hotel & Resort is a modern architectural marvel that mirrors Doha's spectacular dynamism while honoring its storied history. Overlooking the Arabian Sea, each of the hotel's beguiling rooms, suites, and private villas bestows captivating vistas over a private beach and lavish courtyard garden. From attentive, personalized services to an abundance of exceptional indulgences, including international gastronomy and wellness spa, the resort is a haven of unprecedented excellence in the Katara Cultural Village.
